overview_of_class: In this course, students will complete the post-production phase of their thesis projects, which includes finishing steps such as sound mix and color correction. Students will present their completed films or interactive media projects in a public screening that they will organize and publicize. The course will also serve as an introduction to the business side of documentary production, including fundraising for film projects, sustainable business practices and structure, fiscal sponsorships, navigating festivals, broadcast and distribution, DIY exhibition, and audience engagement.
